project.description: Runs stability tests under an AWS baremetal machine

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/bash
set -ex
export CI=true
export GOPATH=${WORKSPACE}/go mkdir -p "${GOPATH}" export GOROOT="/usr/local/go" export PATH=${GOPATH}/bin:/usr/local/go/bin:/usr/sbin:/sbin:${PATH}
export RUNTIME=kata-runtime export RUNTIME_PATH=$(command -v $RUNTIME)
export MAX_CONTAINERS=200 export ITERATIONS=2
tests_repo="github.com/kata-containers/tests" tests_repo_dir="${GOPATH}/src/${tests_repo}" kata_repo="github.com/kata-containers/runtime" kata_repo_dir="${GOPATH}/src/${kata_repo}"
# Get the tests repository mkdir -p $(dirname "${tests_repo_dir}") [ -d "${tests_repo_dir}" ] || git clone "https://${tests_repo}.git" "${tests_repo_dir}"
# Get the kata repository mkdir -p $(dirname "${kata_repo_dir}") [ -d "${kata_repo_dir}" ] || git clone "https://${kata_repo}.git" "${kata_repo_dir}"
# Install go ${GOPATH}/src/${tests_repo}/.ci/install_go.sh -p -f
# Run environment setup cd ${GOPATH}/src/${kata_repo} .ci/setup.sh
# Run k8s e2e conformance tests # cd ${GOPATH}/src/${tests_repo}/integration/kubernetes # ./init.sh
# kubectl get pods --all-namespaces # pushd "e2e_conformance" # sed -i '/pipefail/aset -x' run.sh # ./run.sh # kubectl get pods --all-namespaces # popd # ./cleanup_env.sh
# Run stability tests systemctl is-active --quiet docker || sudo systemctl start docker cd ${GOPATH}/src/${tests_repo}/integration/stability sudo -E PATH=$PATH ./soak_parallel_rm.sh
